nodes.text: The Couronne system was a star system located in the Couronne sector, within the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. It contained the planet Couronne, the homeworld of the sentient Imzig species.

The Couronne system was created for the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion—a StarWars.com supplement to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas from co-authors Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry—which placed the system in grid square P-10.
